metadata.title: CVE-2020-15677 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: By exploiting an Open Redirect vulnerability on a website, an attackercould have spoofed the site displayed in the download file dialog to showthe original site (the one suffering from the open redirect) rather thanthe site the file was actually downloaded from. This vulnerability affectsFirefox < 81, Thunderbird < 78.3, and Firefox ESR < 78.3.

criterions.comment: firefox: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
thunderbird: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
